title.en: Merched y Wawr Tregaron Branch's First Competition 1973
title.cy: Cystadleuaeth gyntaf Merched y Wawr Cangen Tregaron 1973

description.en:
Cystadleuaeth gyntaf Merched y Wawr Cangen Tregaron – Parti Adrodd Cassie Davies – 1973, yn Eisteddfod Rhuthun (cawsant yr ail wobr).
Rhes gefn – Valmai Owen, Elizabeth Jones, Pegi Jones, Mary Richards, Deborah Jones, Beti Davies, Dorothy Evans
Rhes flaen – Gwladys Jones, Nori May Jenkins, Maggie Richards, Megan Morris, Bet John, Myfanwy Huws, Mal Williams, Bet Evans
